sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Table content:
Hardware | PCI/USB ID | Working?
Touchpad |  | Yes
Keyboard |  | Yes
GPU | 8086:9a49 | Yes
Wi-Fi | 8086:a0f0 | Yes
Webcam | 0408:a094 | Yes
Bluetooth | 8087:0026 | Yes
Audio | 8086:a0c8 | Yes
Fingerprint reader | 04f3:0c7f | No

sections.title: Accessibility
sections.content: The firmware interface on the Acer Swift 3 is simple and keyboard-oriented, so it should be trivial to use with OCR devices.

sections.title: Firmware
sections.content: fwupd supports the touchpad, memory technology device, CPU, SSD, TPM, ESRT, and graphics card

sections.title: Secure Boot
sections.content: Secure Boot is enabled by default in the BIOS. In order to disable it, a BIOS administrator password must be set.

sections.title: Function Keys
sections.content:
Table content:
Key | Visible?1 | Marked?2 | Effect
Fn+F1 | Yes | Yes | XF86Sleep
Fn+F2 | Yes | Yes | XF86RFKill
Fn+F3 | Yes | Yes | XF86MonBrightnessDown
Fn+F4 | Yes | Yes | XF86MonBrightnessUp
Fn+F5 | No | Yes | Unknown
Fn+F6 | No | Yes | Turns off display
Fn+F7 | No | Yes | Disables touchpad
Fn+F8 | No | Yes | Toggles keyboard backlight
Fn+F9 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioMute
Fn+F10 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioLowerVolume
Fn+F11 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioRaiseVolume
Fn+F12 | No | Yes | Unknown
Fn+Del | Yes | Yes | Insert
Fn+RightCtrl | Yes | Yes | Menu
Fn+Home | Yes | Yes | Prior
Fn+End | Yes | Yes | Next

1. The key is visible to xev and similar tools.
1. The physical key has a symbol on it, which describes its function.
